verses.name: 2 Samuel 15:15
verses.text: And the king’s servants said unto the king, Behold, thy servants are ready to do whatsoever my lord the king shall appoint.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 15:16
verses.text: And the king went forth, and all his household after him. And the king left ten women, which were concubines, to keep the house.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 15:17
verses.text: And the king went forth, and all the people after him, and tarried in a place that was far off.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 15:18
verses.text: And all his servants passed on beside him; and all the Cherethites, and all the Pelethites, and all the Gittites, six hundred men which came after him from Gath, passed on before the king.
